segments.text: One man adds water into a container while another watches.

critique:
Nobody adds water to the container.
"one"->"One"

temporal.caption: A closeup of a bag of cement mix is shown.
One man adds water into a container while another watches.
The first man pours the cement mix into the container.
The second man uses a mixer on the container.
one of the men applies the mixture to a wall.

captions.full: A closeup of a bag of cement mix is shown. One man adds water into a container while another watches. The first man pours the cement mix into the container. The second man uses a mixer on the container. one of the men applies the mixture to a wall.
